plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm a yummy snack for animals.
☀️ I need sunshine to grow.
💚 I am the color of a frog.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves and pretty colors. You can give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I smell very nice.
💧 I need water to stay fresh.
🌷 You can find me in a vase.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to peel and eat me.
💛 I am yellow when I'm ready to eat.
🍌 I'm a curved, long fruit.

plant.question: I am tall and have a thick trunk and many branches with leaves. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I can give you shade on a sunny day.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I'm a vegetable that grows underground, and rabbits love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange.
🐰 Rabbits eat me for dinner!
🥕 I'm a root.

plant.question: I am a plant that climbs. Sometimes I have grapes growing on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I can wrap myself around things.
🍷 Juice is made from me.
🌿 I have a winding stem.

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp needles. I stay green all year long. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 People put decorations on me during Christmas.
🌲 I have cones.
🌿 My leaves are pointy and sharp.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. I can store lots of water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I live where it's very hot and dry.
🌵 I have sharp spikes to protect myself.
💧 I'm good at saving water.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often eaten in a cinema.
🌽 I start as a kernel.
🔥 Heat makes me change.

plant.question: I am a plant with many layers, and I can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 Some people don't like my smell.
🍽️ I am often used to flavour soups and stews.
😭 I can make your eyes water.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and I'm wet and cold. You need an umbrella when I'm around. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
🌧️ I can make puddles.
☔ You wear a raincoat when I fall.

weather.question: I am hot and bright. I shine in the sky during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I help plants grow.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm strong.
💛 I am yellow and warm.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain or snow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
🌫️ I can block the sun.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. You can make snowballs with me. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice.
🧣 You wear a scarf when I fall.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. You can see me in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am curved.
☀️ I need the sun to appear.
🔴 I have red, yellow, and blue.

weather.question: I am a strong wind that can knock things down. Sometimes I howl. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 Trees sway when I blow.
🪁 I can make kites fly.
💨 I am invisible but you can feel me.

weather.question: I am water that freezes in the sky and falls like little balls. Sometimes I hurt when I hit you. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice, but not like snow.
🤕 I can bounce when I land.
🌨️ I fall during storms.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes after a flash of light in the sky. I make the ground shake. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I follow lightning.
🌩️ I am part of a thunderstorm.
🔊 I make a booming sound.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spin around and around. I form over warm ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center.
🌊 I can cause floods.
🏠 I can damage buildings.

weather.question: I am a dark fog that makes it hard to see. I am often found in cities with lots of cars. What am I?

hints.text: 🏭 I am caused by pollution.
🚗 You can't see very far when I'm around.
🌁 I am a mix of smoke and fog.
